scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm install && npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.localserverdev: npm install express mongoose && npm install -D nodemon concurrently && npm i config && npm i bcryptjs && npm i jsonwebtoken && npm install react-vk
scripts.localreactdev: cd client && npx create-react-app && cd client && npm install materialize-css@next && cd client && npm i @material-ui/lab
